title: Known issue

embed.description: Hey everyone, Update: 10:40am PDT > A fix was deployed, and the issue should now be resolved. Best of luck on the rift! Update: 9:40am PDT Some players might instead see a** grayed Sign In** button. The steps below should resolve that issue as well!

body: When following the steps for the PC, do we have to delete the numbers after "gameflow-patcher-lock:" ?

replies.body: That post was from about 6 months ago, and the issue at that time was specific to patch 7.12 so that fix most likely won't work any longer. You're definitely welcome to go ahead and give those steps a shot, but I would also make sure that you're double checking your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure nothing is blocking your connection from reaching our login servers like firewalls or antivirus.
